DIA_WolfSon_SQ417_SQ417_What_Next_03_01: Maybe someone is making a joke... It's probably the same bastard who destroyed the barrel behind my house!
DIA_WolfSon_SQ417_SQ417_What_Next_03_02: Or Yezegan has summoned some beasts to experiment. I'll talk to him!
DIA_WolfSon_SQ417_SQ417_What_Next_03_03: We'll take care of the rest, while you get back on guard duty.
DIA_WolfSon_SQ417_SQ417_What_Sleep_03_02: Sleep? Don't you see what's happened here? I don't have time to sleep!
DIA_WolfSon_SQ417_SQ417_What_Back_15_01: I am returning to my post immediately.
DIA_WolfSon_SQ417_SQ417_What_Something_1: I heard something... But we don't know what it might have been...
DIA_WolfSon_SQ417_SQ417_What_Something_0: There are some marks on the wall of my house like from blades!
